backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature-evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file listing short descriptions of each frontend source file for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions using OKLCH pink palette with light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component applying light theme and rendering floating hearts and the Valentine screen.
frontend/src/components/CelebrationScree: Page 2 UI showing celebration text, a rounded romantic image, and footer.
frontend/src/components/FloatingHearts.t: Generates randomized floating heart emojis that animate upward in the background.
frontend/src/components/HeartBurst.tsx: Produces a circular burst of animated hearts for the page transition effect.
frontend/src/components/QuestionScreen.t: Main question screen with 'Yes' button and logic for cursor‑based or idle teasing message bubbles.
frontend/src/components/TeasingMessage.t: Renders a single animated teasing chat bubble at a specified position and rotation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity provider and hook managing authentication state, login, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file since no backend queries are required.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers, custom OKLCH color variables, and several keyframe animations with utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App with global styles.
frontend/src/pages/ValentineScreen.tsx: Controls the two-screen Valentine flow, handling acceptance state and running a fade-plus-heart-burst transition.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Extends Tailwind with custom OKLCH colors, radii, shadows, and animations, and registers plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Contains the project’s metadata, requirements, feature descriptions, and design guidance for the interactive Valentine experience.
